channel.title: Noverse on Hiltmon

item.title: What Did I Create as an Asset Manager CTO
item.description: I plan to write more about being a coding CTO, but in the mean time, to set my credentials, I posted an article on Noverse describing, at a high level, what software and systems I have built for Asset Managers. Take a look at What Did I Create as an Asset Manager CTO.
